metadata.title: CVE-2024-10491 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-preview 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: A vulnerability has been identified in the Express response.links function,allowing for arbitrary resource injection in the Link header whenunsanitized data is used.The issue arises from improper sanitization in `Link` header values, whichcan allow a combination of characters like `,`, `;`, and `<>` to preloadmalicious resources.This vulnerability is especially relevant for dynamic parameters.

criterions.comment: node-express package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
